name: FX-7 (Effex-Seven)
Lore: 'Model nicknamed ''Fixit'' by Rebels at Echo Base. Though obsolete in advanced hospitals, FX-7 droids still operate at many Rebel outposts as assistant surgeons.',
Text: 'Once per turn, one of your ''hit'' non-droid characters at same or adjacent site may go to your Used Pile rather than your Lost Pile. Cumulatively subtracts 2 from X on your Bacta Tank.',
